body_html: Hi @sahildua2305 . I haven't worked on the Saver code myself, but looking through it this seems like a reasonable project for someone new to TensorFlow (assuming you have prior Python experience already). I think this will be a small-to-medium-sized change, and that the tricky part will be refactoring the existing code to allow both kinds of deletion modes (don't forget to maintain backwards API compatibility). Apologies if I'm sending you down a rabbit hole :) Looking forward to a PR!

I haven't worked on the Saver code myself, but looking through it this seems like a reasonable project for someone new to TensorFlow (assuming you have prior Python experience already). I think this will be a small-to-medium-sized change, and that the tricky part will be refactoring the existing code to allow both kinds of deletion modes (don't forget to maintain backwards API compatibility).
